kickbot.title: Kick Bot
kickbot.logo-alt: Kick Bot - A game that will really kick your bot! from Two Scoop Games.
kickbot.tagline: A game that will really kick your bot!
kickbot.description: This game is all about quick reflexes and fast action. Maneuver through a procedurally-generated terrain of obstacles like spikes and laser beams. One wrong move and you’re a heap of metal. This game will drive you up the wall!

mediaCoverage.title: I Have a Love/Hate Relationship with Kick Bot
mediaCoverage.description: Kick Bot is a sadistic and masochistic experience that I absolutely love.

mediaCoverage.title: Larry Chupacabra Flappy Jam Finale Video
mediaCoverage.description: Kick Bot is featured in a Flappy Jam lineup video, check it out and don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe!

mediaCoverage.title: CinnamonToastKen Flappy Jam Video
mediaCoverage.description: Kick Bot is featured in a Flappy Jam lineup video, check it out and don't forget to like, comment, and subscribe!

mediaCoverage.title: Flappy Jam
mediaCoverage.description: The official Flappy Jam page for Kick Bot.

scurry.title: Scurry
scurry.description: Scurry is a game where you play as a cockroach who is running through a grocery store, avoid obstacles, get sweet power-ups, and try not to fall! Try to get a high score and beat your friends!

mediaCoverage.title: Larry Chupacabra video review
mediaCoverage.description: Larry reviews the iPad version of Scurry.

mediaCoverage.title: Room With Hands Up video review
mediaCoverage.description: Jump along as RWHU pays scurry and gives his commentary.

mediaCoverage.title: Scurry Featured on Indiestatik!
mediaCoverage.description: If you’ve ever wanted to play a game as a cockroach protagonist, now’s your chance with Two Scoop Games‘ upcoming title, Scurry...

mediaCoverage.title: YAY Scurry - Run Little Roach!
mediaCoverage.description: Youtuber YAYGaming  plays Scurry and give his oppinions!

mediaCoverage.title: Scurry | BE ONE WITH THE COCKROACH
mediaCoverage.description: Youtube review of Scurry by KittehLoaf

syrush.title: SyRUSH
syrush.tagline: Now Available on iPhone, iPad, & iPod Touch
syrush.description: Feel the rush in this fast-paced arcade style game where you tap waffle squares to fill your waffle with the perfect distribution of mouth-watering toppings. Now Available on iPhone, iPad, & iPod Touch. Coming soon to touch-enabled computers!

mediaCoverage.title: SyRUSH featured on AppSpy
mediaCoverage.description: 'SyRUSH is the waffle simulator we've all been waiting for.'

mediaCoverage.title: Larry Chupacabra Reviews SyRUSH
mediaCoverage.description: Youtuber Larry Chupacabra plays and reviews SyRUSH for iOS!

mediaCoverage.title: A virtual breakfast frenzy – Review
mediaCoverage.description: Waffles? Yum! Shouldn’t that be enough to make you wanna play this one?...

duolastic.title: Duolastic
duolastic.description: Online multiplayer game where you can send a link and challenge anyone. Game originally created for #GGJ17 Global Game Jam 2017 theme: Waves

electropolis.title: Electropolis
electropolis.description: Power a city by lightning by matching symbols in the clouds. by @alexbezuska, @lindarthebard, @ericlatrhop, @howdycara, and @lolo_r

mediaCoverage.title: Jupiter Hadley plays Electropolis
mediaCoverage.description: Jupi Plays Indie Games: ALL THE INDIE GAMES [Train Jam 2016] [Part 3]

morningritual.title: Morning Ritual
morningritual.description: Every morning we go through a delicate morning ritual to prepare ourselves for the onslaught of the day. Art/ Animation by Alex Bezuska & Cara Smith. Music/sound by Chris Kincaid @Kincaid_Music. Programming by Eric Lathrop @EricLathrop

mediaCoverage.title: Global Game Jam 2016
mediaCoverage.description: The official Global Game Jam page for Morning Ritual

clusterjunk.title: Cluster Junk
clusterjunk.description: There are millions of tons of trash floating in the oceans. So what goes on while no one is looking in these trash piles? Explore the garbage of humans and try to become the largest trash island in the sea! But hurry, don't let the timer run out! Art/ Animation by Alex Bezuska & Cara Smith. Music/sound by Ben Wiley @Kbenwiley4000. Programming by Eric Lathrop @EricLathrop.

treatmentandcontrol.title: Treatment and Control
treatmentandcontrol.description: Congratulations on your new job, citizen! You must report for duty on Monday to office #74 to distribute vital medication to our workforce. Music/sound by Chris Kincaid @Kincaid_Music. Programming by Eric Lathrop @EricLathrop. Art/Animation by Alex Bezuska @AlexBezuska

mediaCoverage.title: Amy Napkins plays Treatment and Control
mediaCoverage.description: Youtuber Amy Napkins ponders the ethics of her new job in Treatment and Control.

stanleysqueaks.title: Stanley Squeaks and the Emerald Burrito
stanleysqueaks.description: Stanley Squeaks is an adventuring hamster on a quest to obtain the Emerald Burrito. Help Stanley solve puzzles and avoid traps in an ancient temple. This game is a puzzle platformer where the blocks you touch on the way to the treasure are destroyed on the way out, making it difficult to get out alive!

mediaCoverage.title: Louisville Arcade Expo 2015
mediaCoverage.description: Players try out the jam version of Stanley Squeaks at the GameDevLou booth in Indie Alley at Louisville Arcade Expo 2015!

mediaCoverage.title: Lisa Brown (@wertle) plays Stanley Squeaks!
mediaCoverage.description: Lisa Brown of Insomniac games tries out Stanley Squeaks and gives us pointers!

mediaCoverage.title: Larry Chupacabra plays Stanley Squeaks
mediaCoverage.description: Our best youtuber pal Larry plays squeaks, along with all of the GameDevLou #LD30 entries!

thedaytheworldchanged.title: The Day the World Changed
thedaytheworldchanged.tagline: One event can change a lifetime
thedaytheworldchanged.description: The Day the World Changed is a somber reflection on the troubles a new baby can bring to a family and how it can affect the whole community. Controls: left/right arrow keys Game created for the Glabal Game Jam Janurary 2015.

mediaCoverage.title: Global Game Jam 2015
mediaCoverage.description: The official Global Game Jam page for The Day the World Changed.

mediaCoverage.title: Larry Chupacabra plays The Day the World Changed
mediaCoverage.description: Checking out The Day the World Changed a game by TwoScoopGames who created it as a part of the Global Game Jam 2015 indie event...

mediaCoverage.title: YayGaming plays The Day the World Changed
mediaCoverage.description: YayGaming plays The Day The World CHanged, and even makes up a theme song for the game!

desserts.title: Desserts Killed Your Daddy
desserts.description: Defeat as many desserts as possible while keeping your health up with hearts. Enemies you will face are: 3 types of cake turtles, 4 types of walking cookies, and the terrifying GINGERBOSS! Can you get to 50 points and defeat the GINGERBOSS? Cans have a chance of containing a heart which you will need to refill your health. Game created for the Ludum Dare 31 Game Jam December 2014.

mediaCoverage.title: Larry Chupacabra vs the Gingerboss!
mediaCoverage.description: Youtuber Larry Chupacabra plays Desserts Killed your Daddy. Can he defeat the gingerboss and subsequently save the universe?

mediaCoverage.title: Jupiter Hadley takes on desserts!
mediaCoverage.description: Youtuber Jupiter Hadley plays Desserts Killed your Daddy. Jupi takes out her aggression on several tasty foes!

mediaCoverage.title: Lisa Brown vs. the cake turtles!
mediaCoverage.description: Lisa brown of Insomniac games tries out our Ludum Dare entry! Lisa frequently gives feedback on jam games, and is a good friend of GameDevLou!

fluffykins.title: Mr. Fluffykins' Great Sorting Adventure
fluffykins.description: ​Take a peek inside your home internet router to see how all those crazy cat pictures actually get to your computer. Play as Mr. Fluffykins, the cat who sorts your email and deletes your spam. Try to keep the data flowing as long as you can! This game is a Two Scoop collaboration with team Pancake, our Ludum Dare 29 team which consisted of: Aaron Smith, Alex Bezuska, Anthony Quisenberry, Eric Lathrop, Rex Soriano, and Nathan Hutchens.​

mediaCoverage.title: Jupiter_Hadley Reviews Fluffykins
mediaCoverage.description: Mr. Fluffykins is reviewed in a list of good Ludum Dare games.

apartment213.title: Apartment 213
apartment213.description: This is a game about the ways several characters see the small apartment that their lives cross in. You start from the perspective of a small mouse and slowly switch perspectives with the antagonist of each character's own personal stories. These stories are colored by personal bias and each character's own concept of the apartment they interact in reveals more about that character than it does the apartment itself.

mediaCoverage.title: Global Game Jam 2014
mediaCoverage.description: The official Global Game Jam page for Apartment 213.
